text: Nezahualcoyotl (1402 - 1472) was king of Texcoco, a part of the Aztec empire. He was also a famous poet. The name Nezahualcoyotl is Nahuatl, it means "hungry coyote". Category:1402 births Category:1472 deaths Category:Mexican people Category:South American poets Category:Kings and queens Category:Aztec Category:Nahuatl language Category:Writers from Mexico (state) Category:Texcoco
title: Nezahualcoyotl
